languages.text: "Я не угрожала его семье, и уж тем более не заставляла лгать и рисовать еретические знаки! Я даже лицо его не помню. Может, я осуществляла предварительный допрос, но надоумил его на этот балаган кто-то другой!"

"I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but it was someone else who put him up to this!"
languages.original_text: "Я не угрожала его семье, и уж тем более не заставляла лгать и рисовать еретические знаки! Я даже лицо его не помню. Может, я осуществляла предварительный допрос, но надоумил его на этот балаган кто-то другой!"

traits.locale_text: "I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but someone else had put him up to this!"

"I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but someone else had put him up to this!"

"I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but it was someone else who put him up to this!"

"I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but it was someone else who put him up to this!"

"I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but it was someone else who put him up to this!"

languages.text: "Ich habe seine Familie niemals bedroht und ihn sicher nicht gezwungen, dass er lügt und ketzerische Symbole malt! Ich kann mich ja kaum an sein Gesicht erinnern. Mag sein, dass ich ihn vorab verhört habe, aber das hat ihm jemand anderes angetan!"
languages.original_text: "I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but it was someone else who put him up to this!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe seine Familie niemals bedroht und ihn sicher nicht gezwungen, dass er lügt und ketzerische Symbole malt! Ich kann mich ja kaum an sein Gesicht erinnern. Mag sein, dass ich ihn vorab verhört habe, aber das hat ihm jemand anderes angetan!"

languages.text: « Je n'ai jamais menacé sa famille, et je l'ai encore moins forcé à mentir et à dessiner des symboles hérétiques ! C'est à peine si son visage me dit quelque chose. Je l'ai peut-être interrogé par le passé, mais je peux vous assurer que ce n'est pas moi qui l'ai poussé à faire ça ! »
languages.original_text: "I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but it was someone else who put him up to this!"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai jamais menacé sa famille, et je l'ai encore moins forcé à mentir et à dessiner des symboles hérétiques ! C'est à peine si son visage me dit quelque chose. Je l'ai peut-être interrogé par le passé, mais je peux vous assurer que ce n'est pas moi qui l'ai poussé à faire ça ! »

languages.text: «¡Que jamás he amenazado a su familia, y desde luego no le he obligado a mentir y dibujar signos blasfemos! Si apenas recuerdo su cara. ¡Puede que el interrogatorio preliminar fuese cosa mía, pero yo no le he metido esas ideas en la cabeza!».
languages.original_text: "I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but it was someone else who put him up to this!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que jamás he amenazado a su familia, y desde luego no le he obligado a mentir y dibujar signos blasfemos! Si apenas recuerdo su cara. ¡Puede que el interrogatorio preliminar fuese cosa mía, pero yo no le he metido esas ideas en la cabeza!».

languages.text: 「私は彼の家族を脅したことはありませんし、嘘をついたり異端の印を掛けと強要したこともありません！顔さえほとんど覚えていないのです。事前に尋問をしたかもしれませんが、彼にこんなことをさせたのは他の誰かです！」
languages.original_text: "I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but it was someone else who put him up to this!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は彼の家族を脅したことはありませんし、嘘をついたり異端の印を掛けと強要したこともありません！顔さえほとんど覚えていないのです。事前に尋問をしたかもしれませんが、彼にこんなことをさせたのは他の誰かです！」

languages.text: “我从来没威胁过他的家人，自然也没有强迫他撒谎，也没指使过他画什么异端分子的符号！我甚至连这个人的脸都记不清。或许我确实事先审问过他，但这是别人指使他这么说的！”
languages.original_text: "I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but it was someone else who put him up to this!"

traits.locale_text: “我从来没威胁过他的家人，自然也没有强迫他撒谎，也没指使过他画什么异端分子的符号！我甚至连这个人的脸都记不清。或许我确实事先审问过他，但这是别人指使他这么说的！”

languages.text: "Ailesini asla tehdit etmedim. Yalan söyleyip kâfirce işaretler çizmesi içinse onu katiyen zorlamadım! Yüzünü bile güç bela hatırlıyorum. Önceden onu sorgulamış olabilirim ama bu işe onu başkası dâhil etmiş!"
languages.original_text: "I have never threatened his family, and I certainly did not force him to lie and draw heretical signs! I barely even remember his face. I may have interrogated him beforehand, but it was someone else who put him up to this!"
